summary:
Think that lvl 100 charactor is enough to save tamriel?
The TRUE World-Eater has come! (This mod add new Boss and not modify vanilla content.)
His power is beyond Universe. even the flagged Essential or Protected aren't gonna survive.
Only you can save the world from Demigod's Shadow, Can you?
descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]**Please [u]ENDORSE[/u] this if you want to support.[/b][/size][/font]



[/i][size=6][u]First[/u] :)[/size]
[size=4]My English isn't strong so I'm sorry.[/size]


[size=4] If U feel like "My Lvl 100 charactor can handle everything like 10 Alduin at once with deadly dragons, Make miraak cry to his mommy in one hit or strike Harkon down to ashes with only single arrow. Well, look no more! This mod will bring the Dovahkiin and the rest of Tamriel to Sovngarde![/size]

[size=5]Summon-able version's finally here : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60045]Summonable Demigod[/url][/size]


[size=6][u]What's this?[/u][/size]
[font=Tahoma] [/font][size=5][b]This Mod Add New Boss! Not Replace Vanilla One, Detail below.[/b][/size]
[font=Tahoma] [/font][size=4]This mod replace the shrine of Talos in whiterun with the strange shrine that contains spirit of the Demigod.[/size]
[font=Tahoma] [/font][size=3]Demigod is leveled.(Higher level is easier because U have more skills to escape his Insta-kill blade)[/size]


[u][size=6]Requirement
[/size][/u][size=4]Skyrim, Official Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC.[/size]


[u][size=6]How to install
[/size][/u][size=4]Extract everything from zip file into Data folder.
[size=3]*** [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/a1z2ffbkhbdnk2j/Demigod_Possible_Fix..zip]FIX FOR EXTRACT ERROR[/url] Here(Don't forget to endorse too).[/size]
[/size]

[u][size=6]About this mod
[/size][/u][size=4]This mod is just for fun only(I'm laughing everytime seeing Heimskr and the rest impaled with Demigod blade)
At first, This mod was made for personal use for surprise my brother when he's back home. But I think sharing this with other people is OK.[/size]

[b][u]*Warning from me : [/u][/b][size=4]The TRUE World-Eater is here. Alduin is just a big sweetroll jerking around compared to this! I'm warning U cuz my lvl 80 charactor take 30 minute before winning this unavoidable and unresistable Insta-kill blade of the demigod that instantly teleport and killmove you. Essential or Protected aren't help. [/size]
[size=4]There're also surprise when he was defeated too :)[/size]


[u][size=6]Future Plan[/size][/u][size=4][size=3]
-Make a ability to become the demigod yourself! (with all his ability including teleportation and bypass essential flag too.)

[/size][/size]
[u][size=6]History
[/size]
1.0
[/u][size=4]-Mod added to Nexus.[/size]



[i][font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]**Please endorse this if you want to support.
[/b][/size][/font][/i]
author: jimboom555
